name: Death Rings of Jupiter
description: Death Rings of Jupiter is a 2d retro bullet hell shooter, set in the dense asteroid fields that make up the rings of Jupiter. It features original gameplay that mixes classic gravity games and platformers. Hidden somewhere in the rings of Jupiter, there is treasure, and it's guarded by an infestation of alien monsters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Windows Compatible Soundcard Additional Notes: 30fps mode available for low end pc's
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD or any modern hardware accelerated video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Windows Compatible Soundcard
